reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Hotel Tres for 3 nights prior to getting the train to Soller for the rest of our holiday. You can't get a better location in Palma as it right by the cathedral of which you have a wonderful view of from their roof terraces. Our room was fantastic as we were very fortunate to get upgraded to their suite, which provided us with our own roof terrace with hot tub and we loved it. The local bars and cafes are great, as is the breakfast.
reviews.title: The perfect location in Palma

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Palma - the secret gem of majorca -who would have thought that not too far from the santa ponsas and magallufs you would find such a beautiful and compact city. I have fallen for Palma - it is the ultimate city break - sun, culture, fab food, wine, great nightlife and sophisticated and unlike Rome etc you don't feel too guilty for actually lying out in the sun instead of working your way round all the tourist attractions.
reviews.title: luxurious hideaway in the centre of old palma, can't recommend more highly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Palma has a gorgeous cathedral and old town which is where we were based at the stunning Hotel Tres. The hotel is the ultimate in minimalist chich, the bedrooms and bathrooms are 5 star (though flat screen tv could be bigger - minor fault!). the roof top pool is gorgeous and so peaceful with fab views across to the nearby cathedral. Breakfast is lovely with cava and smoked salmon should you wish and it is also very nice for lunch. I cannot fault the hotel at all - stunning stunning stunning but if i was being picky then i think that to charge 3 euro to bring drinks up to pool deck is a bit steep (and doesn't really encourage people to drink from he bar?) but to be honest not much in palma comes cheap so go with the flow.
reviews.title: Scandanavian minialist style with great views of Palma

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Eating out - recommend Forn - fab steaks and mohitos. And as everyone says Abaco for cocktails -15 euro a drink but go for the houSe cocktail which is the size of a goldfish bowl and you will get your monies worth - Fri night petals a bit cheesey but a right of passage! All i can say is if you are booking to go i am v jealous...enjoy.
reviews.title: More than expected - just what I was hoping for!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Just off the equivalent of London's Regent Street and a 20 Euro taxt from the airport; the location is great for those who want a city break that includes designer shopping, winding streets full of smaller interesting shops mixed in with history and a sea view from the roof top terrace - which gives you an excellent view of the cathedral close by. You'll need to travel to get to a decent beach by car or
reviews.title: superb, amazing place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We were a group of nine girls (mid-thirties) staying at Hotel Tres 3 nights in June 2009. The staff helped us out even before we arrived with dinner reservations etc. and they were really fast in answering e-mails! At arrival the welcoming was very friendly, and all requests were answered promptly and they tried their best to help us out with whatever we needed during our stay.
reviews.title: Why settle for anything but perfect?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our superior rooms were spacious and nicely designed, the air-condition system worked almost a little too well (the room, especially the floors, were ice cold, but anyway a welcoming change from the burning hot weather outside). The bathrooms were perfect to share for three, but you cannot be shy as the loo is only separated from the rest of the room by a frosted glass door that does not entirely cover the door opening. I only have one complain about the room – the extra bed was not at all suitable for grown-ups. I am 1.75 cm and my feet were way outside the bed, thankfully I could use two of the pillows from the main bed to extend the length.
reviews.title: Good choice for the old town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast is absolutely delicious, and perfect to enjoy outside in the patio. There are a lot of small rooftop terraces everywhere, but we mostly met up at the one with the tiny pool. Perfect for enjoying drinks and to take a quick bath to cool off, but do not expect to take your morning laps there – it is too small for swimming.
reviews.title: Luxurious secret in the heart fo Palma City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is not as busy and happening as Puro Hotel, but why would you want to stay in the middle of the noise when you can party all night and then retreat to a heavenly oasis right in the centre of town?
reviews.title: Lovely Tres in a sunny Palma in march

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all, this is added to the list as one of my favourite hotels; I will not hesitate to recommend it to anyone travelling to Palma! And you should. Hasta la vista, baby.
reviews.title: Perfect from start to finish

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A wonderful hotel in a superb location. We spent one night here in a celebration and found it just perfect. We had specifically booked the room with the balcony and it was just as expected. The area the hotel is in is full of life, restaurants and perfect for people watching over cocktails.
reviews.title: Absolutely amazing hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008
reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel for anyone staying in palma
reviews.title: Super Birthday treat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment the manager replied i knew we were in for something special.Had asked if a kettle would be in our room and he replied no but will buy us one at no charge as he was already in the christmas spirit!. Having mentioned it was my girlfreind's birthday we were delighted in being upgraded to a junior suite. Wow! We arrived in this charming part of old Parma and as we walked through the classic arched entrance of the hotel we could appreciate the perfect combination of classic grandeur and contemporary modernistic design and clean lines that only Scandinavians can perfect.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Greeted by freindly staff and the charming Svenn, the Norwegian manager we were whisked to our suite and presented with a perfect bottle of dry white wine.
reviews.title: Another excellent stay in the Hotel Tres

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooftop has to be experienced, beautifully designed with groovy pool, sunbeds and sauna with amazing views across the rooftops towards the sea ,mountains and majestic cathederal.
reviews.title: Perfect Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in superior room #411, 5-8 June 2010
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I'm really pleased to note the GM and his excellent friendly staff have managed to make this a high quality service minded hotel! It's rare to find this in Spain. I stayed here few years ago and was not impressed by the service then. Spacious, well maintained designer rooms, a great courtyard in a tranquil athmospere, brilliant roof/sun terraces and a general beautiful design hotel in a rustic old building. Already booked new stay in July!
reviews.title: Quiet charming hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Tres is located in the center, in a street with a lot of restaurants, just a few minutes walking from the cathedral and most of the sites.
reviews.title: Going downhill - fast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: There is a lovely indoor courtyard, a pleasant lobby with sofas, magazines, a bar, and free internet.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - Another TripAdvisor gem !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was very good, with a lot of choices.
reviews.title: Ideal location hidden away in old town palma
